scripts.process:css: echo '=> processing css' && npm run lint:scss -s && npm run scss:dev -s
scripts.process:js: echo '=> processing js' && eslint 'src/js/**/*.js' && npm run bundle:dev -s
scripts.dev: echo '=> building' && npm run process:css -s && npm run process:js -s
scripts.prod: echo '=> building' && npm run scss:prod -s && npm run bundle:prod -s
scripts.prestart: npm run test -s && npm run dev -s
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run server -s"
